Class Theme

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.Theme
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProxyTheme, SegmentTheme
public class Theme extends Object
A theme is a collection of symbols for one layer of a map.
Author:
Douglas Lau
